member.name: IAccClientDocMgr.GetDocuments

summary.para: Clients call IAccClientDocMgr.GetDocuments to get a list of all documents that have been registered with the Microsoft Active Accessibility run time.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: A list of document interface pointers.

member.name: IAccClientDocMgr.GetFocused

summary.para: Clients call the IAccClientDocMgr.GetFocused method to access a pointer for the document that has focus.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: IID of the document being requested. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.
Interface pointer to the document being requested.

member.name: IAccClientDocMgr.LookupByHWND

summary.para: Clients call IAccClientDocMgr.LookupByHWND to get a document by providing the HWND for the document.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The HWND of the document to be returned.
IID of the document being requested. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.
Interface pointer to the document being requested.

returns.para: If not successful, returns the following value or another standard COM error code.

listheader.description: If the HWND does not correspond to an active document, then ppunk will be NULL.

member.name: IAccClientDocMgr.LookupByPoint

summary.para: Clients call IAccClientDocMgr.LookupByPoint to get a document object from a point within the document.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: A point inside the bounding rectangle of the document to be returned.
IID of the document being requested. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.
Interface pointer to the document being requested.

returns.para: If not successful, returns the following value or another standard COM error code.

listheader.description: If the value in pt does not fall within the bounding rectangle of an active document, then ppunk will be NULL.
